intro_success.title: Study Successful
intro_success.description: You managed to focus for a few hours. The material is dry, but you feel a sense of accomplishment. You found a receipt in the textbook.

intro_fail.title: Distracted
intro_fail.description: You tried to study, but without the textbook, you just stared at the wall. Your anxiety grows.

coffee_break.title: Caffeinated
coffee_break.description: The bitter liquid warms your soul. You feel ready to take on the world, or at least one more hour of calculus.

art_therapy.title: Art Therapy
art_therapy.description: You paint your feelings. It's messy, but it helps clear your mind.

art_practice.title: Studio Time
art_practice.description: You work on your technique. You produced some decent sketches. A new opportunity for your hobby has opened up.

board_decay.title: Overwhelmed
board_decay.description: The task was left unattended for too long. It weighs on your mind, draining your mental state.
